txt.en: 'It is true, I am the terror of the night!'
'You can not hope to stop me!'
'The night was made for fence running!'
'The shadow lurks in the fields!  Beware the shadow!'
'I run so fast, I barely touch the fence posts!'
'I love the smell of mushroom fields in the night!'
'The inhabitants of this neighbourhood keep telling me they want a party tree like old Mad Baggins'...why ever for?'
'I have ordered many rose-bushes for the neighbourhood gardens. They shall be such a beautiful addition!'
'Sometimes it feels like nothing but weeds grow in the chalky ground of Michel Delving.'
'Have you seen the size of the harvest-flies this year? They are abominable!'
